<DESCRIPTION>RULE 13A-14(A) CERTIFICATIONS
<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
<TITLE>RULE 13A-14(A) CERTIFICATIONS</TITLE>
</HEAD>
<BODY bgcolor="#FFFFFF">
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<P align="right"><FONT size="2"><B>EXHIBIT&nbsp;31.1</B></FONT>

<P align="center"><FONT size="2"><B>CERTIFICATIONS</B>
</FONT>

<P align="left"><FONT size="2">I, Henry M. Paulson, Jr., certify that:
</FONT>
<P>
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
<TR valign="top">
    <TD width="3%"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="1%" align="left" nowrap><FONT size="2">1.</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="3%"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD colspan="4" width="93%"><FONT size="2">I have reviewed this Annual Report on Form&nbsp;10-K
for the year ended November&nbsp;28, 2003 of The Goldman Sachs
Group, Inc.;</FONT></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
    <TD><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
</TR>
<TR valign="top">
    <TD width="3%"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="1%" align="left" nowrap><FONT size="2">2.</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="3%"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD colspan="4" width="93%"><FONT size="2">Based on my knowledge, this report does not
contain any untrue statement of a material fact or
omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements
made, in light of the
circumstances under which such statements were made, not
misleading with respect to the
period covered by this report;</FONT></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
    <TD><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
</TR>
<TR valign="top">
    <TD width="3%"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="1%" align="left" nowrap><FONT size="2">3.</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="3%"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD colspan="4" width="93%"><FONT size="2">Based on my knowledge, the financial
statements, and other financial information included in this
report, fairly present in all material respects the financial
condition, results of operations and
cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods
presented in this report;</FONT></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
    <TD><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
</TR>
<TR valign="top">
    <TD width="3%"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="1%" align="left" nowrap><FONT size="2">4.</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="3%"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD colspan="4" width="86%"><FONT size="2">The registrant&#146;s other certifying officer(s)
and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining
disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act
Rules&nbsp;13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e))
for the registrant and have:</FONT></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
    <TD><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
</TR>
<TR valign="top">
    <TD width="3%"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="1%" align="left" nowrap><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="3%"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="3%"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="1%" align="left" nowrap><FONT size="2">a)</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="3%"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="86%"><FONT size="2">Designed such disclosure controls and
procedures, or caused such disclosure controls
and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to
ensure that material information
relating to the registrant, including its consolidated
subsidiaries, is made known to us by
others within those entities, particularly during the period
in which this report is being
prepared;</FONT></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
    <TD><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
</TR>
<TR valign="top">
<TD width="3%"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="1%" align="left" nowrap><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="3%"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="3%"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="1%" align="left" nowrap><FONT size="2">b)</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="3%"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="86%"><FONT size="2">Evaluated the effectiveness of the
registrant&#146;s disclosure controls and procedures and
presented in this report our conclusions about the
effectiveness of the disclosure controls
and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this
report based on such
evaluation; and</FONT></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
    <TD><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
</TR>
<TR valign="top">
<TD width="3%"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="1%" align="left" nowrap><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="3%"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="3%"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="1%" align="left" nowrap><FONT size="2">c)</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="3%"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="86%"><FONT size="2">Disclosed in this report any change
in the registrant&#146;s internal control over financial
reporting that occurred during the registrant&#146;s most recent
fiscal quarter (the registrant&#146;s
fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that
has materially affected, or is
reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant&#146;s
internal control over financial
reporting; and</FONT></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
    <TD><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
</TR>
<TR valign="top">
    <TD width="3%"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="1%" align="left" nowrap><FONT size="2">5.</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="3%"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD colspan="4" width="93%"><FONT size="2">The registrant&#146;s other certifying officer(s)
and I have disclosed, based on our most recent
evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the
registrant&#146;s auditors and the audit
committee of the registrant&#146;s board of directors (or persons
performing the equivalent functions):</FONT></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
    <TD><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
</TR>
<TR valign="top">
<TD width="3%"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="3%" align="left" nowrap><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="1%"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="3%"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="1%" align="left" nowrap><FONT size="2">a)</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="3%"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="86%"><FONT size="2">All significant deficiencies and
material weaknesses in the design or operation of
internal
control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely
to adversely affect the
registrant&#146;s ability to record, process, summarize and
report financial information; and</FONT></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
    <TD><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
</TR>
<TR valign="top">
<TD width="3%"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="3%" align="left" nowrap><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="1%"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="3%"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="1%" align="left" nowrap><FONT size="2">b)</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="3%"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="86%"><FONT size="2">Any fraud, whether or not material,
that involves management or other employees who
have a significant role in the registrant&#146;s internal control
over financial reporting.</FONT></TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<TR valign="bottom">

    <TD valign="top"><FONT size="2">Name: Henry M. Paulson, Jr.</FONT></TD>

<TR valign="top">
    <TD width="3%"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="1%" align="left" nowrap><FONT size="2">1.</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="3%"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD colspan="4" width="93%"><FONT size="2">I have reviewed this Annual Report on Form&nbsp;10-K for
the year ended November&nbsp;28, 2003 of The Goldman Sachs Group,
Inc.;</FONT></TD>

<TR>
    <TD><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>

    <TD width="3%"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>

    <TD width="3%"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD colspan="4" width="93%"><FONT size="2">Based on my knowledge, this report does not
contain any untrue statement of a material fact or
omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements
made, in light of the
circumstances under which such statements were made, not
misleading with respect to the
period covered by this report;</FONT></TD>

    <TD colspan="4" width="93%"><FONT size="2">Based on my knowledge, the financial statements,
and other financial information included in this
report, fairly present in all material respects the financial
condition, results of operations and
cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods
presented in this report;</FONT></TD>

<TR>
    <TD><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>

    <TD width="3%"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD colspan="4" width="93%"><FONT size="2">The registrant&#146;s other certifying officer(s) and
I are responsible for establishing and maintaining
disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act
Rules&nbsp;13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e))
for the registrant and have:</FONT></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
    <TD><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>

<TR valign="top">
    <TD width="3%"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>

    <TD width="1%" align="left" nowrap><FONT size="2">a)</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="3%"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
    <TD width="86%"><FONT size="2">Designed such disclosure controls and
procedures, or caused such disclosure controls
and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to
ensure that material information
relating to the registrant, including its consolidated
subsidiaries, is made known to us by
others within those entities, particularly during the period
in which this report is being
prepared;</FONT></TD>

<TR>
    <TD><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>

registrant&#146;s disclosure controls and procedures and

report based on such

<TR>
    <TD><FONT size="2">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>

the registrant&#146;s internal control over financial
reporting that occurred during the registrant&#146;s most recent

has materially affected, or is

internal control over financial

<P align="right"><FONT size="2"><B>EXHIBIT 32.1</B></FONT>

<P align="center"><FONT size="2"><B>Certification</B>
</FONT>

<P align="left"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Pursuant
to 18 U.S.C. &#167; 1350, the undersigned officer of
The Goldman Sachs Group, Inc. (the &#147;Company&#148;), hereby
certifies that the Company&#146;s Annual Report on Form&nbsp;10-K for
the year ended November&nbsp;28, 2003 (the &#147;Report&#148;) fully complies
with the requirements of Section&nbsp;13(a) or 15(d), as
applicable, of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 and that
the information contained in the Report fairly presents, in
all material respects, the financial condition and results of
operations of the Company.
</FONT>

<DESCRIPTION>OPINION OF PRICEWATERHOUSECOOPERS LLP
<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
<TITLE>OPINION OF PRICEWATERHOUSECOOPERS LLP</TITLE>
</HEAD>
<BODY bgcolor="#FFFFFF">
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<P align="right"><FONT size="2"><B>EXHIBIT 99.1</B></FONT>

<P align="center"><FONT size="2"><B>REPORT OF INDEPENDENT AUDITORS</B>
</FONT>

<P align="left"><FONT size="2">To the Directors and Shareholders of<BR>
The Goldman Sachs Group, Inc.:
</FONT>

<P align="left"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;We have audited the consolidated financial statements of The
Goldman Sachs Group, Inc. and subsidiaries (the &#147;Company&#148;) at
November&nbsp;28, 2003 and November&nbsp;29, 2002, and for each of the
three fiscal years in the period ended November&nbsp;28, 2003 and have
issued our report thereon appearing on page&nbsp;67 of the Company&#146;s
Annual Report to Shareholders, which expresses an unqualified
opinion, dated January&nbsp;26, 2004. Such consolidated statements and
our report thereon are incorporated by reference in Part II, Item
8 &#147;Financial Statements and Supplementary Data,&#148; of this Annual
Report on Form&nbsp;10-K.
</FONT>
<P align="left"><FONT size="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;We have also previously audited, in accordance with auditing
standards generally accepted in the United States of America, the
consolidated statements of financial condition at November&nbsp;30,
2001, November&nbsp;24, 2000 and November&nbsp;26, 1999, and the related
consolidated statements of earnings, changes in shareholders&#146;
equity and partners&#146; capital, cash flows and comprehensive income
for the years ended November&nbsp;24, 2000 and November&nbsp;26, 1999 (none
of which are presented herein); we expressed unqualified opinions
on those consolidated financial statements. In our opinion, the
information set forth in the selected financial data for each of
the five years in the period ended November&nbsp;28, 2003, appearing
on page&nbsp;103 of the Company&#146;s Annual Report to Shareholders, which
is incorporated by reference in Part II, Item&nbsp;6 of this Annual
Report on Form&nbsp;10-K, is fairly stated, in all material respects,
in relation to the consolidated financial statements from which
it has been derived.
</FONT>
<P align="left"><FONT size="2">/s/ PRICEWATERHOUSECOOPERS LLP
</FONT>

<P align="left"><FONT size="2">New York, New York<BR>
January&nbsp;26, 2004</FONT>
